a.span: Go to Performance and Finance Accountability...

div.marquee: The buildings may be closed, but learning will continue! Join us on this new and exciting journey of continuous learning!

div.p:
USD 111 staff will put on a “THANK YOU” Community School Parade.
Come to one of these communities’ main street areas to see our staff parade by and say Thank You. The parade will begin their route in Bendena at 10:00 and then travel through the list on the flyer.

a.aria-label: Read more about Community School Parade

h3.a: Doniphan West Elementary Families Rise to the Challenge!

div.p: The students and families of Doniphan West Elementary School were challenged to decorate windows and/or sidewalks as their first art project of distance learning. Many families and students rose to the challenge, creating beautiful, original designs on windows, fences, sidewalks, and doors! Driving around the towns of our school district, visitors will notice all of the beautiful artwork on many homes! We are so . . .

a.aria-label: Read more about Doniphan West Elementary Families Rise to the Challenge!

div.p: The D-West Jr./Sr. High School Teachers miss their students!

a.aria-label: Read more about Your Teachers Miss You!

div.p: Don't forget that our school counselor Mrs. Schneider is still available to students! Email Mrs. Schneider to schedule an appointment. See attached flyer for resources.

a.aria-label: Read more about Counseling Services

h3.a: Sources of Help for Feeding Children

div.p: For over two years, Hunger Free America TM has been operating the USDA National Hunger Hotline. The hotline is a resource for individuals and families seeking information on how to obtain food. The National Hunger Hotline staff connects callers with emergency food providers in their community, government assistance programs, and various social services. The hotline can be reached at 1-866-3-HUNGRY or 1-877-8- . . .

a.aria-label: Read more about Sources of Help for Feeding Children

div.p:
With all the changes going on right now, here is a little good news to brighten your Friday! Congratulations to the 3rd Quarter Honor Roll students! Please click the following link.
3rd Quarter Honor Roll

a.aria-label: Read more about 3rd Quarter Honor Roll

div.p:
USDA and Kansas Department of Education want to make free school meals available to any child, and understand that each family's situation is different as we navigate distance learning. They are now making it possible for parents/guardians, caregivers or siblings to pick up meals, even if all children are not present.
If you want:
Parent/Guardian to pick up meal at any location: you must email . . .

a.aria-label: Read more about Update to Mobile Meal Program

input.p: Your name, phone number and email address are kept private and are for the sole use of the Doniphan West USD 111 site. For full details, see our privacy and security policy.

I give U.S.D 111 and its schools permission to contact me via my cellular device for automated phone calls and SMS text messages for general messages. I understand that emergency notifications are excluded from this permission and will be sent as normal. By signing, I certify that I am the owner of this cellular device and its user contract.
